transcript.title: Doorstop Interview, Treasury Place, Melbourne
transcript.content:
Subject:
ALP National Conference.

E&OE...

JOURNALIST:

Prime Minister what's your reaction to Mr Rudd's speech this morning?

PRIME MINISTER:

Well Mr Rudd's biggest responsibility today was to outline to the Australian people a plan to keep the Australian economy strong and prosperous into the future, and he completely ignored it.

[ends]
